body.name: EZDIY-FAB PCIe 5.0 12VHPWR GPU Power Bridge, 12+4 Pin Angle Connector Power Adapter, for RTX40' Series GPUs, Compatible with RTX4090, 4080, 4070ti - White 180° RVS
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 10 hrs 13 mins
features: The perfect solution for users experiencing trouble with their RTX40' series gpus power cables protruding too far from their PC case, preventing the side panel from closing properly and removing stress on your components.

The power bridge feature a strengthened PCB design that enables an angled connection without any wire bending. This ensures full contact with all cable terminals and eliminates the risk of thermal issues that can occur due to tight bending radii.

Kindly be aware that our angled adapter has a maximum power output capacity of 450W. Going beyond this threshold could lead to overheating and potential harm to your equipment. To guarantee optimal performance and minimize the risk of problems, it is essential to confirm that your PC case provides adequate ventilation.

The Angled Adapter has a low-profile design, extending just 23mm, which provides increased room and clearance between your graphics card and the side panel. This feature is ideal for compact chassis and simplifies the installation of large cards. Be sure to verify that there is at least a 23mm gap between the side panel and the GPU.

We provide two distinct variations of our angled adapter: the 90-degree angle and the 180-degree angle options. The 180-degree angle adapter is well-suited for setups with constrained space or for individuals who favor a more condensed layout. Conversely, the 90-degree angle adapter is well-suited for more spacious builds and provides enhanced flexibility in cable routing. Additionally, please review the compatible list before making your purchase, as there are two connector direction options: S

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 12VHPWR GPU ANGLE ADAPTER, POWER BRIDGE Introducing our new angled adapter - the perfect solution for users experiencing trouble with their RTX40 series graphics card power cables protruding too far from their PC case, preventing the side panel from closing properly and removing stress on your components.

Safe Design EZDIY-FAB 12VHPWR Angled Adapter creates extra space and clearance between your graphics card and side panel. Its reinforced PCB design allows for a zero-bending connection, ensuring full contact with all cable terminals and eliminating the possibility of thermal issues caused by tight bending radii.

Previous page Plug with Safe High-Conductivity Copper Terminals Crafted from high-quality alloy copper, for its exceptional conductivity and stability. Power Secure IPC Standard PCB 2oz copper thickness, providing excellent heat dissipation and robust current-carrying capabilities Angle Routing Cable Sleek Design Stylish and clean multi-angle cut shell design that looks great in your build. Next page 1 CONNECTOR 2 PCB 3 DESIGN

Important Notes: This product cannot be used with incompatible Graphics Card, as it may result in system damage.If the product you are using is not listed in the compatibility list below, please contact buyer support services for assistance.Before operating, ensure that this product is fully plugged into the GPU connector to ensure proper functionality and safety.Please note that our angle adapter supports a maximum power output of 450W. Exceeding this limit may cause overheating and damage to your device. To ensure optimal performance and prevent any potential issues, please make sure that your PC case has proper ventilation.

Two Angles, Black and White We offer two different versions of our angled adapter: The 180-degree angle adapter is perfect for builds with limited space or for users who prefer a more compact design. The 90-degree angle adapter, on the other hand, is ideal for larger builds and offers more flexibility in cable routing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Available in white for white PC builds.Cleans up that ugly cable clutter of the stock adapterPrevents the cable from making a sharp bend against the PC case side panel.Cons:No GPU replacement warranty like its more expensive competitor.

GPU power bridge is well-made have never had any issues with easy DIY and any of their stuff it’s always been of good quality. This connecter is for the new 40 series graphics cards and when attached to a 4070 TI from MSI fitment was exact and had no issues. Quite literally plug-and-play. It looks good and as well made follow the directions on the listing to ensure that you order the correct one as the orientation of the pins matter. I followed the pin descriptions based off of the graphics card I have and matched to the listing and had no issues. Great product I will definitely get another one for another build.
見栄えが良くなるので購入しました、がネットではコネクタ部が燃えた焦げたなどの報告が上がっていますEZDIY-FABは激安メーカーの為、サポートや連絡先などが無く12VHPWRコネクタは高額GPU採用なのでいざというときに泣かないようにしっかりとしたメーカーであるCORSAIRの方がいいと思う自分は4080に付けたが一週間で外した

reviews.reviewTitle: ケースのグラボが見えるガラス面がスッキリ。
reviews.reviewText: グラボの電源ケーブルの出方を180度変えられるのでガラス面がかなりスッキリしました。ケースを光らせている方で電源ケーブルが邪魔している場合はこの商品凄く良いです。通電も今の所問題ありません。

Makes my computer look much cleaner, with no cables in front of the GPU. It also makes it so you can run slightly shorter cables as well, in case yours don't reach right now. It's smaller than the pictures make it look, so keep that in mind. It's not much bigger than the size of the 12VHPWR connector itself.

It does what it says but it's kind of got a cheap looking finish, the edges could be done better and not be left so sharp. It's also very small, the pictures don't really convey how small it really is.
